summary: Gives the sword the same properties as the blades sword.
descriptionHtml:
This simple mod tweaks the properties of Harkon\'s Sword so that it has the same properties as the blades sword. I was rather surprised when I notice the stats were about the same as an iron sword. I also adjusted the ridiculous amount of low charges 23 to 50 so the weapon doesn\'t need to be charged after every melee. 

Tweaks are the following:

-damage rasied to 11 (was 8)
-critical damage raised to 5 (was 4)
-increased charge consumption so the sword has about 50 charges (was 23)

Again weapon stats are exactly the same as a blades sword now since they have the exact blade design.
author: Meraxes
